Text: Oh yeah, the resolution is now 960 X 670 and only HD ready Divx players will play it.

Hey Cracka, thanks for the compliment, i appreciate it. Glad that you enjoy it. I spent a lot of time getting it and restoring it.
Never bothered leaving a comment before but just had to for this .... classic film and an excellent restoration job. Looks really good ... are you working on any others?
other restorations I've done include Assault of the Killer Bimbos, the Flesh Gordon movies and Fairy Tales.
Hardbodies (restored from VHS) and Amazons are other resoration jobs I did.
Excellent copy...by far the best i have searched so far on this site & e-mule. worth the waiting.Thanks a lot. long live.
Sounds nice, but do you have internet service to seed it anymore??? 0 seeds 8 peers and no file!
Well, most clowns have downloaded other inferior versions of the movie and not this one. I needed help and didn't get it. Maybe I'll put it up again soon, cuz I did a lot of work on it.
Thanbks for this....keep up the good work!
Fantastic work! by far the best i've ever seen.Thank you! You deserve all the bone's in the locker!
